001package com.technototes.library.logger.entry;
002
003import com.technototes.library.util.Color;
004import java.util.function.Supplier;
005
006public class BooleanEntry extends Entry<Boolean> {
007
008    private StringEntry trueEntry, falseEntry;
009
010    public BooleanEntry(
011        String n,
012        Supplier<Boolean> s,
013        int index,
014        String wt,
015        String wf,
016        Color c,
017        String tf,
018        String ff,
019        Color tc,
020        Color fc
021    ) {
022        super(n, s, index, c);
023        trueEntry = new StringEntry("", () -> wt, -1, Color.NO_COLOR, tf, tc);
024        falseEntry = new StringEntry("", () -> wf, -1, Color.NO_COLOR, ff, fc);
025    }
026
027    @Override
028    public String toString() {
029        return (get() ? trueEntry : falseEntry).get();
030    }
031}
